review.description:
Stopped by in the morning for coffee and a donut before work. They have Du Donuts, and also non-Du Donuts (which are significantly cheaper). You can also get a free regular donut if you check into the Food Park on Yelp!

The latte I had was good, the Boston creme donut was good. Staff was friendly. Pretty empty all around, but a few folks inside.

They also have an ice cream station. Multitasking!
review.author: Kenny C.

review.description: I ordered the midas taco on their menu which had a picture of eggs, tomatoes and avocado.  I opened up the premade microwaved food and there was no sign of anything resembling my order. Premade foods that get reheated when you're expecting something fresh is not what you expect from a food hall. If I wanted that I would've gone to taco bell. They were nice enough to refund my order, but it was a waste of time that I didn't have.
review.author: Alyssa L.
